name: pWebArc
description: Personal Private Passive Web Archive is a suite of tools to collect, save, mirror, manage archives of (i.e. hoard), and view web pages and whole websites offline.
author: Jan Malakhovski

showLog.description: Show the log of recently collected and discarded reqres

showTabState.description: For the current tab, show the internal state

showTabLog.description: For the current tab, show the log of recently collected and discarded reqres

toggleTabConfigTracking.description: For the current tab, toggle tracking and reset it for the tab's new children

toggleTabConfigChildrenTracking.description: For current tab's new children, toggle tracking

toggleTabConfigLimbo.description: For the current tab, toggle limbo mode and reset it for the tab's new children

toggleTabConfigChildrenLimbo.description: For current tab's new children, toggle limbo mode

unmarkAllTabProblematic.description: For the current tab, unmark all problematic reqres

collectAllTabInLimbo.description: For the current tab, collect all reqres in limbo

discardAllTabInLimbo.description: For the current tab, discard all reqres in limbo
